alert.note: Alert for South Washington Coast (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 12 at 2:15PM PST until February 14 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM MONDAY TO 10 AM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Wet snow expected. Total snow accumulations of a trace to 0.5 inches, except 0.5 to 3 inches above 500 feet. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...In Oregon, North Oregon Coast. In Washington, South Washington Coast. * WHEN...From 10 PM Monday to 10 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map
